statements: SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data;
SELECT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, face_encoding FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE image_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT id, image_url FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_url, id FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY image_url DESC;
SELECT * FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT id, image_url, face_encoding FROM facial_recognition_data WHERE image_url LIKE '%front%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS total_faces FROM facial_recognition_data GROUP BY id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_faces DESC;
SELECT id, image_path, person_id FROM face_images;
SELECT image_path, person_id, id FROM face_images;
SELECT person_id, id, image_path FROM face_images;
SELECT * FROM face_images;
SELECT embedding_array, image_id, id FROM face_embeddings;
SELECT * FROM face_images WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT image_path FROM face_images WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM face_embeddings WHERE image_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, embedding_array FROM face_embeddings WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM face_images JOIN face_embeddings ON face_images.id = face_embeddings.image_id;
SELECT id, image_url, encoding FROM training_data;
SELECT image_url, id, encoding FROM training_data;
SELECT encoding, image_url, id FROM training_data;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, created_at, model_id FROM models;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT image_url FROM training_data WHERE id = 8;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT model_id, model_name, created_at FROM models ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, full_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_data FROM images WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT label_id, label_name, description FROM labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT data_id, image_id, label_id, accuracy FROM training_data WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT full_name, facial_features FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT image_data, timestamp FROM images WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT label_name, description FROM labels WHERE label_id = 3;
SELECT image_id, label_id, accuracy FROM training_data WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM Persons LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age FROM Persons WHERE age > 25;
SELECT person_id, name, age FROM Persons ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Persons WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age FROM Persons WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM Persons WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM Persons WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Persons WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Persons WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT person_id, name FROM Persons WHERE age < 25 OR gender = 'Non-Binary';
